00352    inline int CellList::totCells() const

00355    /*
00356    *  Return index of the cell that contains the position array pos = {x, y, z}.
00357    */
00358    inline int CellList::cellIndexFromPosition(const Vector &pos) const
00359    {
00360       int cx, cy, cz;
00361 
00362       /* 
00363       * Elements of invCellWidths_ are inverses of the widths of a single
00364       * cell. They are defined in makeGrid. If (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL), these
00365       * are given in Cartesian coordinates, or otherwise in dimensionless
00366       * generalized coordinates.
00367       */
00368 
00369       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00370          cx = int(pos[0]*invCellWidths_[0]);
00371          cy = int(pos[1]*invCellWidths_[1]);
00372          cz = int(pos[2]*invCellWidths_[2]);
00373       } else {
00374          Vector posG;
00375          boundaryPtr_->transformCartToGen(pos, posG);
00376          cx = int(posG[0]*invCellWidths_[0]);
00377          cy = int(posG[1]*invCellWidths_[1]);
00378          cz = int(posG[2]*invCellWidths_[2]);
00379       }
00380 
00381       #if 0
00382       // need to handle case where wrong particle bin is assigned
00383       // to particles close to the boundary due to roundoff error
00384       if (cx == numCells_[0]) {
00385          if (pos[0] >= lengths_[0])
00386             UTIL_THROW("Particle left boundary.");
00387          cx = numCells_[0] - 1;
00388       }
00389       if (cy == numCells_[1]) {
00390          if (pos[1] >= lengths_[1])
00391             UTIL_THROW("Particle left boundary.");
00392          cy = numCells_[1] - 1;
00393       }
00394       if (cz == numCells_[2]) {
00395          if (pos[2] >= lengths_[2])
00396             UTIL_THROW("Particle left boundary.");
00397          cz = numCells_[2] - 1;
00398       }
00399       #endif
00400 
00401       assert(cx >= 0);
00402       assert(cx < numCells_[0]);
00403       assert(cy >= 0);
00404       assert(cy < numCells_[1]);
00405       assert(cz >= 0);
00406       assert(cz < numCells_[2]);
00407 
00408       return cz + cy*numCells_[2] + cx*YZCells_;
00409    }
00410 
00411    /*
00412    * Remove an Atom object from its Cell.
00413    */
00414    inline void CellList::deleteAtom(Atom &atom)
00415    {
00416       int atomId   = atom.id();
00417       assert(isValidAtomId(atomId));
00418       CellTag& cellTag = cellTags_[atomId];
00419       cells_[cellTag.cellId].deleteAtom(cellTag);
00420    }
00421 
00422    /*
00423    * Add a Atom to the appropriate cell, based on its position.
00424    */
00425    inline void CellList::addAtom(Atom &atom)
00426    {
00427       Vector position = atom.position();
00428       int    cellId   = cellIndexFromPosition(position);
00429       int    atomId   = atom.id();
00430       assert(isValidAtomId(atomId));
00431       cells_[cellId].addAtom(cellTags_[atomId], atom, cellId);
00432    }
00433 
00434    /*
00435    * Update CellList to reflect new atom position
00436    */
00437    inline void CellList::updateAtomCell(Atom &atom, const Vector &pos)
00438    {
00439       int atomId = atom.id();
00440       assert(isValidAtomId(atomId));
00441       CellTag& cellTag = cellTags_[atomId];
00442       int      oldCell = cellTag.cellId;
00443       int      newCell = cellIndexFromPosition(pos);
00444       if (oldCell != newCell) {
00445          cells_[oldCell].deleteAtom(cellTag);
00446          cells_[newCell].addAtom(cellTag, atom, newCell);
00447       }
00448    }
00449 
00450    /*
00451    * Fill an array with Ids of atoms that are near a specified position.
00452    */
00453    inline void
00454    CellList::getNeighbors(const Vector &pos, NeighborArray &neighbors) const
00455    {
00456       int nInCell;
00457       int ic = cellIndexFromPosition(pos);
00458       getCellNeighbors(ic, neighbors, nInCell);
00459    }

00461    // Private inline methods:
00462 
00463    /*
00464    * Return value of integer cell coordinate x for axis i shifted to the range
00465    * minCells_[i] <= x <= maxCells_[i].
00466    */
00467    inline int CellList::shiftCellCoordAxis(int i, int x) const
00468    {
00469       if (x > maxCells_[i]) return x - numCells_[i];
00470       if (x < minCells_[i]) return x + numCells_[i];
00471       return x;
00472    }
00473 
00474    /*
00475    * Return integer index of a cell with integer coordinates (cx,cy,cz).
00476    */
00477    inline int CellList::cellIndexFromCoord(int cx, int cy, int cz) const
00478    {
00479       return cx*YZCells_ + cy*numCells_[2] + cz ;
00480    }
00481 
00482    /*
00483    * Return (by reference) int coordinates (cx,cy,cz) of cell with index i.
00484    */
00485    inline
00486    void CellList::cellCoordFromIndex(int i, int &cx, int &cy, int &cz) const
00487    {
00488       cx = (int)(i / YZCells_);
00489       i = i - cx*YZCells_;
00490       cy = (int)(i / numCells_[2]);
00491       cz = i - cy*numCells_[2];
00492    }
00493 
00494    inline int CellList::gridDimension(int i) const
00495    {  return numCells_[i]; }
00496 
00497    inline bool CellList::isAllocated() const
00498    {  return (cells_.capacity() > 0); }
00499
